GSP28sabbha1u:330: yat tu pratyakaviruddhaṃ vacanam upanyastaṃ śa eṣa yajñāyudhī yajamāno 'ñjasā svargaṃ lokaṃ yātīti pratyakṣaṃ śarīraṃ vyapadiśati” iti,
GSP28sabbha1u:335: nainam upalabhāmahe / - nanu prāṇādibhir enam upalabhāmahe / yo 'sau prāṇiti apāniti ucchvasiti nimiṣati ityādi ceṣṭitavān,
GSP28sabbha1u:336: so 'tra śarīre yajñāyudhīti / - nanu śarīram eva prāṇity apāniti ca ?
GSP28sabbha1u:337: - na prāṇādayaḥ śarīraguṇāḥ / śarīraguṇavidharmāṇo hi te,
GSP28sabbha1u:338: ayāvaccharīrabhāvitvāt / yāvaccharīraṃ tāvad asya guṇā rūpādayaḥ / prāṇādayas tu saty api śarīre na bhavanti / ato na śarīraguṇāḥ prāṇādayaḥ / sukhādayaś ca svayam upalabhyante,
GSP28sabbha1u:339: na rūpādaya iva śarīraguṇāḥ pareṇāpi / tasmāc charīraguṇavaidharmyād anyaḥ śarīrād yajñāyudhīti /
GSP28sabbha1u:340: āha : kuta eṣa saṃpratyayaḥ śukhādibhyo 'nyas tadvān asti” iti ?
GSP28sabbha1u:341: na hi sukhādipratyākhyānena tasya svarūpam upalabhāmahe / tasmāc chaśaviśāṇavad asau nāsti / - athocyate:
GSP28sabbha1u:343: - na kasyacid api iti vakyāmaḥ / na hi yo ya upalabhyate,
GSP28sabbha1u:344: tasya tasya saṃbandhinā bhavitavyam / yasya saṃbandho 'py upalabhyate saṃbandhī ca,
GSP28sabbha1u:345_0: tasya ayaṃ saṃbandhīti gamyate / na hi candramasam ādityaṃ vā upalabhya saṃbandhyantarānveoaṇā
GSP28sabbha1u:345_1: bhavati “kasyāyam” iti / na kasyacid api ity avadhāryate / tasmān na sukhādibhyo
GSP28sabbha1u:345_2: 'nyas tadvān astīti / athopalabdhasya avaśyaṃ kalpayitavyaḥ saṃbandhī bhavet / -
GSP28sabbha1u:345_3: tata ātmānam apy anena prakāreṇa upalabhya “kasyāyam” iti saṃbandhyantaram anviṣyema /
GSP28sabbha1u:345_4: tam api kalpayitvā 'nyam api kalpayitvā 'nyam ity anavasthaiva syāt / atha kaṃcit
GSP28sabbha1u:345_5: kalpayitvā na saṃbandhyantaram api kalpayiṣyasi tāvaty eva viraṃsyasi tāvatā ca paritokṣyasi,
GSP28sabbha1u:346: tato vijñāna eva parituṣya tāvaty eva virantum arhasi /
GSP28sabbha1u:347: atrocyate: yadi vijñānād anyo vijñātā nāsti, kas tarhi “jānāti” ity ucyate ?
GSP28sabbha1u:348: jñānasya kartur abhidhānam anena śabdenopapadyate / tad eṣa śabdo 'rthavān kartavya iti jñānād vyatiriktam ātmānaṃ kalpayiṣyāma iti /
GSP28sabbha1u:349: āha : devā enaṃ śabdam arthavantaṃ kalpayiṣyanti,
GSP28sabbha1u:350: yadi kalpayitavyaṃ maṃsyante / bahavaḥ khalv iha janā “asty ātmā,
GSP28sabbha1u:351: asty ātmā” ity ātmasattāvādina eva śabdasya pratyakṣavaktāro bhavanti,
GSP28sabbha1u:353: kim aṅga punar “jānāti” iti parokṣaśabdadarśanāt / tasmād asad etat /
GSP28sabbha1u:356: nānupalabdhapūrve / yathā merum uttareṇa yāny asmajjātīyair anupalabdhapūrvāṇi svādūni vṛkṣaphalāni,
GSP28sabbha1u:357_0: na tānipraty asmākam icchā bhavati / no khalv anyena puruṣeṇa upalabdhe 'pi viṣaye
GSP28sabbha1u:357_1: 'nyasyānupalabdhur icchā bhavati / bhavati cānyedyur upalabdhe 'paredyur icchā /
GSP28sabbha1u:357_2: atas tenopalambhanena samānakartṛkā sā ityavagacchāmaḥ / yadi vijñānamātram evedam
GSP28sabbha1u:358: pradhvaste tasmin kasyāparedyur icchā 'bhaviṣyat / atha vijñānād anyo vijñātā nityas,
GSP28sabbha1u:360: aparedyur api sa evaiṣiṣyati / itarathā icchānupapannā syāt /
GSP28sabbha1u:361: atrāha : anupapannam iti naḥ kva saṃpratyayaḥ ?
GSP28sabbha1u:362: yan na pramāṇena avagatam / vijñānāt tāvad anyan nopalabhāmahe / yac ca nopalabhāmahe,
GSP28sabbha1u:363: tac chaśaviṣāṇavad eva nāsti ity avagacchāmaḥ / na ca tasmin asati vijñānasadbhāvo 'nupapannaḥ,
GSP28sabbha1u:364: pratyakṣāvagatatvād eva / kṣaṇikatvaṃ cāsya pratyakṣapūrvakam eva / na ca jñātari vijñānād anyasmin asati jñāne cānitye aparedyur icchā anupapannā,
GSP28sabbha1u:365: pratyakṣāvagatatvād eva / no khalv apy etad dṛṣṭaṃ “ya evānyedyur upalabhā,
GSP28sabbha1u:366: sa evāparedyur eṣitā” iti / idaṃ tu dṛṣṭaṃ yat “kvacid anyena dṛṣṭam anya icchati,
GSP28sabbha1u:367: kvacin na ; samānāyāṃ santatāv anya icchati,
GSP28sabbha1u:368: santatyantare necchati” iti / tasmān na sukhādivyatirikto 'nyo 'stīti /
GSP28sabbha1u:370: na hy “asmartāra icchanti” ity upapadyate / na cādṛṣṭapūrve smṛtir bhavati / tasmāt kṣaṇike vijñānaskandhamātre smṛtir anupapanneti /
GSP28sabbha1u:372: smṛtir api icchāvat / pūrvavijñānasadṛśaṃ vijñānaṃ pūrvavijñānaviṣayaṃ vā smṛtir ity ucyate / tac ca draṣṭari vinaṣṭe 'py aparedyur utpadyamānaṃ nānupapannam,
GSP28sabbha1u:373: pratyakṣāvagatatvād eva / anyasmin skandhaghane 'nyena skandhaghanena yaj jñānaṃ,
GSP28sabbha1u:374: tat tatsantatijena anyenopalabhyate nātatsantatijena / tasmāc chūnyāḥ skandhaghanā iti / athāsmin arthe brāhmaṇam bhavati:
GSP28sabbha1u:375: “vijñānaghana evaitebhyo bhūtebhyaḥ samutthāya tāny eva anuvinaśyati:
GSP28sabbha1u:378: naitad evam / anyedyur dṛṣṭe 'paredyur “aham idam adarśam” iti bhavati pratyayaḥ / pratyagātmani caitad bhavati,
GSP28sabbha1u:379: na paratra / paro hy asau yo 'nyedyur dṛṣṭavān / tasmāt tadvyatirikto 'nyo 'sti,
GSP28sabbha1u:385: atrocyate: na vayam “aham” itīmaṃ śabdaṃ prayujyamānam anyasmin arthe hetutvena vyapadiśāmaḥ,
GSP28sabbha1u:386: kiṃ tarhi śabdād vyatiriktaṃ pratyabhijñāpratyayam / pratīmo hi vayam imam arthaṃ “vayam evānyedyur upalabhāmahe,
GSP28sabbha1u:387: vayam evādya smarāma” iti / tasmād vayam imam artham avagacchāmo “vayam eva hyo,
GSP28sabbha1u:388: vayam evādya” itil / ye cāmī hyo 'dya ca,
GSP28sabbha1u:389_0: na te vinaṣṭāḥ / athāpy asmin arthe brāhmaṇaṃ bhavati / śa vāre 'yam ātmā” iti prakṛtya
GSP28sabbha1u:389_1: āmananti “aśīryo na hi śīryata” iti / tathā “avināśī vāre 'yam ātmā anucchittidharmā”
GSP28sabbha1u:389_2: iti / vinaśvaraṃ ca vijñānam / tasmād vinaśvarād anyaḥ sa ity avagacchāmaḥ / na ca
GSP28sabbha1u:389_3: śakyam evam avagantuṃ “yathopalabhyante 'rthā na tathā bhavanti,
GSP28sabbha1u:390: yathā tu khalu nopalabhyante tathā bhavanti” iti / tathā hi sati “śaśo nāsti,
GSP28sabbha1u:391: śaśasya viṣāṇam asti” ity avagamyeta / na ca ahampratyayo vyāmoha iti śakyate vaktum,
GSP28sabbha1u:392: bādhakapratyayābhāvāt / tasmāt sukhādibhyo vyatirikto 'sti / evaṃ cet,
GSP28sabbha1u:394: āha : yadi vijñānād anyad asti vijñātṛ,
GSP28sabbha1u:395: vijñānam apāsya tan nidarśyatām “idaṃ tad īdṛśaṃ ca” iti / na ca tan nidarśyate / tasmān na tato 'nyad asti iti /
GSP28sabbha1u:396: atrocyate: svasaṃvedyaḥ sa bhavati / nāsāv anyena śakyate draṣṭum / katham asau nidarśyeteti ?
GSP28sabbha1u:397: yathā ca kaścic cakṣuṣmān svayaṃ rūpaṃ paśyati na ca śaknoty anyasmai jātyandhāya tan nidarśayituṃ,
GSP28sabbha1u:398: na ca “tan na śakyate nidarśayitum” ity etāvatā ṅāsti” ity avagamyate,
GSP28sabbha1u:399: evam asau puruṣaḥ svayam ātmānam upalabhate na cānyasmai śaknoti darśayitum,
GSP28sabbha1u:400: anyasya draṣṭus taṃ puruṣaṃ prati darśanaśaktyabhāvāt / so 'py anyaḥ puruṣaḥ svayam ātmānam upalabhate,
GSP28sabbha1u:401: na parātmānam / tena sarve svena svenātmanā ātmānam upalabhamānāḥ santy eva,
GSP28sabbha1u:402: yady api parapuruṣair nopalabhyanta iti / athāsmin arthe brāhmaṇaṃ bhavati “śāntāyāṃ vāci kiṃjyotir evāyaṃ puruṣaḥ ?
GSP28sabbha1u:404: samrāḍ iti hovāca” iti / pareṇa nopalabhyata ity atrāpi brāhmaṇaṃ bhavati “agṛhyo na hi gṛhyata” iti / pareṇa na gṛhyata ity etadabhiprāyam etat / - kutaḥ?
GSP28sabbha1u:407: kena punar upāyena ayam anyasmai kathyata iti ?
GSP28sabbha1u:408: - atrāpy upāye brāhmaṇaṃ bhavati śa eṣa neti nety ātmneti hovāca” iti / asāv “ayam evaṃrūpa” iti na śakyate nidarśayitum / yac ca paraḥ paśyati,
GSP28sabbha1u:409: tatpratiṣedhas tasyopadeśopāyaḥ / śārīraṃ paraḥ paśyati / tenātmā upadiśyate / “śarīraṃ nātmā;
GSP28sabbha1u:410_0: asti śarīrād anyaḥ sa cātmā” iti śarīrapratiṣedhena ātmopadiśyate / tathā prāṇādayo
GSP28sabbha1u:410_1: nātmāna iti tatpratiṣedhena tebhyo 'nya upadiśyate / tathā parasthāḥ sukhādayaḥ pareṇa
GSP28sabbha1u:410_2: liṅgair upalabhyante / te 'pi nātmāna iti tatpratiledhena tebhyo 'nya upadiśyate /
GSP28sabbha1u:412: na tato 'nyaḥ puruṣa ity etad api puruṣapravṛttyā anumīyate,
GSP28sabbha1u:413_0: yadā ' sau puruṣaḥ pūrvedyuḥ sāmikṛtānām arthānāṃ pratisamādhāne śeṣānuṣṭhāne ca
GSP28sabbha1u:413_1: yatate / ataḥ pravṛttyāvagamyate ṅūnam asāv anityān nityam avagacchati” iti / upamānāc
GSP28sabbha1u:414: anenopamānenāvagaccha “aham api tādṛśam eva paśyāmi” iti,
GSP28sabbha1u:415: yathā kaścid ātmīyāṃ vedanāṃ parasmā ācakṣśīta “dahyamānasyeva me bhavati,
GSP28sabbha1u:417: rudhyamānasyeva me bhavati” iti / ataḥ svayam avagamyamānatvād asti tadvyatiriktaḥ puruṣa iti /
GSP28sabbha1u:418: yad apy ucyate “vijñānam apāsya tan nidarśyatām” iti,
GSP28sabbha1u:420: na śakyam upāyam antareṇa upeyam upetum / ayam evābhyupāyo jñatavyānām arthānāṃ “yo yathā jñāyate,
GSP28sabbha1u:421: sa tathā” iti / tad yathā: “kaḥ śuklo nāma?
GSP28sabbha1u:424: ” “yac chuklaśabda uccarite pratīyate / ” tasmān na vijñānaṃ pratyākhyāya kasyacid rūpaṃ nidarśayituṃ śakyam /
GSP28sabbha1u:425: na ca niyogataḥ pratyaye pratīte pratyayārthaḥ pratīto bhavati / apratīte 'pi hi pratyaye saty arthaḥ pratīyata eva / na hi vijñānaṃ pratyakṣaṃ,
GSP28sabbha1u:426_0: vijñeyo 'rthaḥ pratyaka ity etat pūrvam evoktam / tad avaśyakartavye 'pahnave kāmaṃ
GSP28sabbha1u:426_1: vijñānam apahnūyeta nārtha ity etad apy uktam eva / tasmād asti sukhādibhyo 'nyo nityaḥ puruṣa iti /
GSP28sabbha1u:427: atha yad uktaṃ “vijñānaghana evaitebhyo bhūtebhyaḥ samutthāya tāny evānuvinaśyati,
GSP28sabbha1u:430: “atraiva mā bhagavān mohāntam āpīpadad” iti 1 paricodanottarakāle 'pahnutya mohāntābhiprāyam asya vacanasya varṇitavān ṅa vāre 'haṃ mohaṃ bravīmi,
GSP28sabbha1u:432: mātrāsaṃsargas tv asya bhavati” iti / tasmān na vijñānamātram / tasmād vai1amyam / yad uktaṃ ṅa caiṣa “yāti” iti vidhiśabda” iti,
GSP28sabbha1u:433: mā bhūd vidhiśabdaḥ / śvargakāmo yajeta” iti vacanāntareṇa avagatam anuvadiṣyate / tasmād avirodhaḥ /
